title: This is the title of an issue I've created.

content.desc_short: A handful of GOP senators have joined the demands for investigation into the scandal surrounding Michael Flynn's resignation as national security adviser, but most Republican leaders have backed off or remained silent.
content.desc_full: A handful of GOP senators have joined the demands for investigation into the scandal surrounding Michael Flynn's resignation as national security adviser, but most Republican leaders have backed off or remained silent.A handful of GOP senators have joined the demands for investigation into the scandal surrounding Michael Flynn's resignation as national security adviser, but most Republican leaders have backed off or remained silent.A handful of GOP senators have joined the demands for investigation into the scandal surrounding Michael Flynn's resignation as national security adviser, but most Republican leaders have backed off or remained silent.A handful of GOP senators have joined the demands for investigation into the scandal surrounding Michael Flynn's resignation as national security adviser, but most Republican leaders have backed off or remained silent.
